titleStmt.title: The transactioneer, with some of his philosophical fancies in two dialogues.
titleStmt.author: King, William, 1663-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: "A satire upon Sir Hans Sloane, who edited the Transactions of the Royal Society." Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
